attributes.action: Stop Using Horses for Crowd Control
attributes.additional_details:
Horses should be replaced by vehicles for controlling crowds.


Horses are dumb animals and are courageous. They are sent to the front by Humans, who are not-so-dumb and not-so-courageous.


Vehicles cannot experience fear or pain. Unlike horses, they are immune to crowd pressure and to missiles. They also provide a more solid barrier.


We pride ourselves on our animal welfare and our technology. Why not combine the two and develop a vehicle to replace the horse for crowd control?
